qas.question: What is Seattle's gay pride parade called?
How many Independence Day celebrations does Seattle have yearly?
When are Seafair events held in Seattle?
What is the focus of the Bumbershoot festival?

context: Among Seattle's prominent annual fairs and festivals are the 24-day <a0_0>Seattle International Film Festival<a0_0/>, Northwest Folklife over the Memorial Day weekend, numerous Seafair events throughout <a3_0>July and August<a3_0/> (ranging from a Bon Odori celebration to the Seafair Cup hydroplane races), the <a1_0>Bite of Seattle<a1_0/>, one of the largest Gay Pride festivals in the United States, and the <a4_0>art and music<a4_0/> festival Bumbershoot, which programs music as well as other art and entertainment over the Labor Day weekend. All are typically attended by 100,000 people annually, as are the Seattle Hempfest and <a2_0>two<a2_0/> separate Independence Day celebrations.
